ResponseRule.name: Life Review: Alex Intro
ResponseRule.description: Player is a Typhon infused with human neural material in a future where the Typhon have won. The remnants of humanity are trying to create a Typhon organism that has empathy toward humanity. The new Looking Glass tech allows for an in-depth simulation of the past. Survivors are concerned with analyzing the player's choices thru the events of Talos I. They will decide the player's fate based on the choices the player made. After the game ends we see a black screen for several beats. We hear murmurs and echoing voices faintly in the background. Then: digital artifacts give way to technical log spam scrolling by as if along the curvature of a visor in front of the player's face. A few fixed elements "Looking Glass Visor V3.1" blink prominently.
